title: The Ballad Of The 13-Year-Old North Korean Capitalist
teaser: In North Korea, tiny private markets have emerged where people can buy and sell food and clothing. In fact, one 13-year-old girl went into business for herself, and the government of North Korea tried to stop her support of capitalism.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
